question: Which female Hockey player won the ‘Dhruv Batra Player of the Year Award 2019’ at the Hockey India Annual Awards?
explanation:
India men’s and women’s hockey captains Manpreet Singh and Rani Rampal were awarded the top honours- Dhruv Batra Award for Player of the Year (Men and Women respectively) at the Hockey India 3rd Annual Awards ceremony held at New Delhi.
Recently Manpreet became the first Indian player to win FIH Men’s Player of the Year and Rani Rampal became the first Indian athlete to win the prestigious World Games Athlete of the Year 2019.
